tasks.label: Apply Codex Patch
args: $patch = Get-Clipboard; if (-not $patch) { Write-Host 'Clipboard is empty'; exit 1 }; $file = '.codex.patch'; $patch | Out-File -FilePath $file -Encoding utf8; git apply --3way --index $file; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { Write-Host 'git apply failed; writing rejects if any'; git apply --reject --whitespace=fix $file; exit 0 } else { git status --short; Write-Host 'Patch applied & staged' }
